name: Silver Hamsa // Opal Pendant
description:
Purchasing this digital file makes you the owner of the pendant! Message me thru my twitter account, linked to this profile and we'll get you the physical artpiece! Thank you so much for sharing the love!

Sterling Silver Hamsa 👁🌊
🌊
Pure Pisces waves, Hamsa hand brings protection and includes that evil eye vibe to ward of negative spirits and unwanted energy, and also incorporates the vibe of the healing hands relating to reiki and other holistic healing modalities!
🌊
Australian Opal gets us in touch with the crown chakra and the third eye most of all, and the blue theme in here makes it quite aquatic, I would compare the astral experience as a crashing tide of imagination, that we can dive into and swim around in, fully soaking in our mind and playing in our dreams.
🌊
When’s the last time you lost yourself in a fantastic daydream, and brought it back here to bring to life? That is what we were created for after all, isn’t it? To create and express our hearts? 🥰
🌊
Song: “Ease Your Mind” by Ganja White Knight and Griz
